snippet: Leftist politician Hamdeen Sabahi officially submitted his bid on Saturday to run for Egypt's presidency, making him the second candidate for next month's election alongside former army-chief Abdel Fattah al-Sisi who is widely expected to win....

headline.print_headline: Egyptian Leftist Politician Submits Bid to Run for President
headline.main: Egyptian Leftist Politician Submits Bid to Run for President

lead_paragraph: Leftist politician Hamdeen Sabahi officially submitted his bid on Saturday to run for Egypt's presidency, making him the second candidate for next month's election alongside former army-chief Abdel Fattah al-Sisi who is widely expected to win.
